name: My Plant Planner - Notion Template
description: A way to keep all your plant children organized.Update: New design!Keeping up with all of your plants has never been easier. I have about 30 houseplants and almost as many in my garden. It can be a hassle to remember everyone's watering schedules and who needs special care and when.
